subject: Shea Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The mood at Shea Stadium during the closing ceremony was far more than nostalgia. It was honor, it was respect, it was love. But it was tempered by the sad sense that sometimes things don’t work out.
snippet: The mood at Shea Stadium during the closing ceremony was far more than nostalgia. It was honor, it was respect, it was love. But it was tempered by the sad sense that sometimes things don’t work out.
